item.title: Problem Fixed, thanks Chaos =]
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:10, topic:273901”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=361936.msg2751600#msg2751600 date=1239936782]

hey yet again, i’m here with another problem!

I just recently made this command:

 if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragongear") && 

playerRights >=1)
            {
                sendMessage("Yea...Some Dragon Gear.. 

Sweet...");
                    addItem(3140,1);
                    addItem(4087,1);
                    addItem(7611,1);
                    addItem(1149,1);
                    addItem(2904,1);
                    addItem(7461,1);
                    addItem(1702,1);

and when I place it in, I get 100 errors in the compiler.
I tried making it look like the other commands, to no avail.

So basically I’m stuck! lol, Can anyone tell me what I’m doing wrong?

Much appreciated

Spar.

Horrific coding conventions…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragongear") && playerRights >= 1) { sM("Yea...Some Dragon Gear.. Sweet..."); addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(7611,1); addItem(1149,1); addItem(2904,1); addItem(7461,1); addItem(1702,1); }

That looks a little better…
[/quote]1. Your an idiot, he already said “Yay it worked, thanks Chaos”
2. That’s what I just fucking said
3. Soul just said horrific conventions… I doubt you know em yourself.[/quote]

Where the hell did Soul say horrific coding conventions? I wasn’t giving him the solution to his problem, I was fixing his conventions a little bit. K, asshole. I’ll remove my post.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Fixed, thanks Chaos =]
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Sparhawk, post:5, topic:273901”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=361936.msg2751529#msg2751529 date=1239934410]
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dragongear”) && playerRights >=1)
{
sendMessage(“Yea…Some Dragon Gear… Sweet…”);
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(7611,1);
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(2904,1);
addItem(7461,1);
addItem(1702,1);
}

K try that
[/quote]

KK tried, and now I get this:

client.java:7267: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage("Yea...Some Dragon Gear.. Sweet..."); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

I’m not putting it in right am i? :D[/quote]

I’m assuming you’re using DeltaScape, which has the method name ‘sM’ rather than ‘sendMessage.’

Read full topic

Press any key to continue . . .

Did I enter it wrong perhaps?
